sentences.en: As a result they sometimes swerve unpredictably, making life even harder for the players.
sentences.cn: 因此,它们有时会出人意料地发生转向, 为球员制造了更大的麻烦.

sentences.en: Because the cave fish may not need less sleep—they may need to stay awake to forage more in an environment where food can be scarce and appear unpredictably.
sentences.cn: 因为穴居鱼可能并不需要睡得更少——它们可能需要保持清醒，以便更经常地在食物短缺和食物不常出现的环境中觅食。

sentences.en: Conflict in close relationships often occurs privately and unpredictably.
sentences.cn: 在亲密关系下冲突经常私下和不可预知地发生.

sentences.en: Due to a shortage of robots, the employees are human beings and will unpredictably to abuse.
sentences.cn: 因为机器人紧缺, 本地职工为人类,受虐时将有不可预测的反应.

sentences.en: Economies are behaving unpredictably and will continue to do so.
sentences.cn: 各经济体的表现难以预料,这种情况将持续下去.

sentences.en: Hardship, frustrating and discouraging, is the God of the destiny that changing unpredictably all the time.
sentences.cn: 使人沉沦的和令人绝望的苦难, 就是有着一副阴阳脸的命运之神.

sentences.en: His sermons were unpredictably witty and satirical as well as eloquent.
sentences.cn: 没想到的是,他的布道诙谐、机智而且流畅.

sentences.en: Monthly costs can rise or fall unpredictably.
sentences.cn: 每月的花费可能增加也可能减少，很难预测。

sentences.en: News itself unpredictably, otherwise it is not news.
sentences.cn: 而新闻本身的出现是不可预测的, 否则就不成其为新闻了.

sentences.en: Thus, the victorious army is that which embraces such unpredictably and can respond accordingly.
sentences.cn: 因此, 总是那些能接受不可预料的变化并随之做出反应的军队,成为最后的胜者.

sentences.en: Turbulence is very dangerous and will causes the kite to behave unpredictably.
sentences.cn: 喧嚣非常危险,而且意志导致风筝无法预测地行为表现.

sentences.en: Yes, climate on this highland always changes unpredictably.
sentences.cn: 是的, 高原地区的气侯就是这么变化多端.

words.tran_cn: 不可预知的；不定的；出乎意料的
不可预测性，不可预知性；不可预见性

trans.tran_cn: 无法预言地，不可预见地，不能预料地
